timeline.bodyText: Please turn the iteration order around (instead of 0...size to size...0). The reason is that this sometimes skips indices when removing an item. You can therefore end up with feeds that have counter 0 and are still displayed.
timeline.author: ByteHamster

timeline.bodyText: Could you please move click handling to NavDrawerFragment.onItemClick? All other items of the sidebar are handled in that file. It's also a good practice to keep displaying (adapter) and behavior (click listener) separated. I must admit that this is not always the case in the code base but in this case, it should be pretty easy to do.
